title: Euro zone to pick candidate to replace ECB's Coeure in October: Centeno
text:
Euro zone to pick candidate to replace ECB's Coeure in October: Centeno

Economy 1 hour ago (Sep 13, 2019 06:36AM ET)

HELSINKI (Reuters) - The Eurogroup of euro zone finance ministers launched on Friday the process to replace Benoit Coeure on the board of the European Central Bank when his mandate ends in December, the group's chair Mario Centeno said on Friday. Euro zone finance ministers will pick a candidate in October, Centeno told a news conference in Helsinki.

Euro zone to pick candidate to replace ECB's Coeure in October: Centeno
